author: SkinnyTaste
name: Zoats or Zucchini Oats

ingredients.notes: peeled and pulsed in a food processer

instructions: Combine the first 6 ingredients in a small pot, zucchini to cinnamon and turn the heat on medium-low. Cook, stirring until the oats are creamy and cooked through, about 3 to 5 minutes, depending on the oats. Pour into a bowl and top with blueberries, slivered almonds and remaining cinnamon.
